name: Hip Thrust
setup: Sit with upper back against bench edge
Place dumbbell across hips (use towel for comfort)
steps: Engage core and drive through heels
Thrust hips up by squeezing glutes
Create straight line from knees to shoulders
Pause briefly at top with glutes squeezed
mistakes: Pushing through toes instead of heels
Not fully engaging glutes at top
safety: Avoid overextension of lower back. Focus on glute activation rather than just hip height.

prescriptionHints.notes: Focus on glute squeeze and control

joints.notes: Avoid excessive back extension. Focus on hip hinge pattern and glute engagement.
